Metadata: Ocean and Coastal Law Memo (Issue 43 and 44, June and September 1995)
Oregon State University Extension/Sea Grant Program
Two newsletter issues in one entry for 1995.

Ocean and Coastal Law Memo is an aperiodic publication of the University of Oregon Ocean and Coastal Law Center (OCLC) and is distributed by the Oregon State University Extension/Sea Grant Program. The following topics are in these issues: Issue 43: Update and Commentary on Columbia-Snake River Salmon Recovery, by M. A. Brown with assistance from A. Coffman and N. Farmer. Issue 44: Recent Developments in Ocean and Coastal Law, 1994-1995, R. Breitbard and D. Brown with the assistance of N. Farmer, G. Boledovich, M. Brown, A. Coffman, J. Coontz, and S. O'Shea.
